definition: to pull up (stop one's vehicle)/to park/(of a machine) to stop working/to stall
to stay somewhere temporarily/to stop over
to have a power failure/power cut
to park (a car etc)/to moor (a boat etc)/to leave sth (in a place)
to cease trading (temporarily or permanently)/to close down
to stop work/to shut down/to stop production

sentences.english: He stopped and chuckled as he tugged at his gray goatee .
sentences.chinese: 說到這裏他停了下來，捋着山羊鬍子格格地笑着。

sentences.english: I parked the car in the backyard.
This one was heart-shaped all satiny red with a pink bow on top.
sentences.chinese: 就像一隻粉紅色的蝴蝶停在一朵深紅的玫瑰上面。

sentences.english: Dr. Halsey held up a hand , indicating that he halt.
sentences.chinese: 哈爾茜博士舉起一隻手，示意他停一下。

sentences.english: Up the hill, down the hill, up the second hill. Suddenly she stopped, not knowing where she was.
sentences.chinese: 突然，她停了下來，不知道自己到哪了。

sentences.english: The ferry ties up at the south slip.
The engine shut off, and we coasted to a stop.
sentences.chinese: 引擎熄火了，我們滑行了一段後停了下來。

sentences.english: And you are saying wait a minute, he has violated the Pauli Exclusion Principle.
sentences.chinese: 你們有人在喊我停一下，說我違反了保利不相容原理。

sentences.english: The clip-clop of horses' hooves came closer and stopped right in front of the inn.
sentences.chinese: 嘀嘀噠噠的馬蹄聲越來越近就停在小店門前。

sentences.english: The studentapplies for suspension of study due to special difficulties or the student isordered to quit schooling by NMU.
sentences.chinese: 因特殊情況經本人申請或學校認爲必須休學或停學者。

sentences.english: We had to stop every few miles.
sentences.chinese: 每走幾裏地，我們就得停一下。

sentences.english: She halted in the shadow of a vat, allowing me to regain my feet and breath.
sentences.chinese: 她停在一個染缸的陰影裏，讓我勻一勻呼吸和腳步。

sentences.english: Slides easily up the rope and jams when the cam is loaded.
sentences.chinese: 防墜器向上滑動自如，而向下受重時凸輪會制停。

sentences.english: Paul left his convertible parked in the rain with the roof open.
sentences.chinese: 保羅把敞篷車停在雨中，車頂沒關就離開了。

sentences.english: The vehicle, painted white with a red crescent, was parked at the clinic entrance, where Osama was busily cleaning it.
sentences.chinese: 車漆成白色，噴上紅新月標識，停在醫院門口。

sentences.english: The water was cut off when I was taking a shower last night.
sentences.chinese: 昨天晚上衝澡衝到一半的時候，水突然就停了。

definition: variant of 復|复[fu4]/to reply to a letter
(of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb
to pull up (stop one's vehicle)/to park/(of a machine) to stop working/to stall
row/line/commercial firm/line of business/profession/to rank (first, second etc) among one's siblings (by age)/(in data tables) row/(Tw) column

to walk/to go/to travel/a visit/temporary/makeshift/current/in circulation/to do/to perform/capable/competent/effective/all right/OK!/will do/behavior/conduct/Taiwan pr. [xing4] for the behavior-conduct sense
to make a round trip/return journey/back and forth/to and fro/repeatedly
(of fire, lamp etc) to go out/to put out (fire)/(fig.) to die down/(of a vehicle) to stall
to get on or into (a bus, train, car etc)
